rt

Interface LightGeometry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Intersectable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PointLight

    public interface LightGeometry
extends Intersectable
    An interface to implement light sources. Light sources derive from this interface, and they store a reference to a Material with an emission term. As an examples, see PointLight.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HitRecord sample(float[] s)
      Sample a point on a light geometry.

      • Methods inherited from interface rt.Intersectable

        intersect

    • Method Detail

      • sample

        Sample a point on a light geometry.
